title: get basic info for a youtube video
description: Test the GET /api/video/info endpoint with a valid YouTube URL query parameter to verify it returns the correct video metadata with HTTP 200 status.

title: start or reuse a transcription job for a video
description: Test the POST /api/video/process endpoint by submitting a valid videoId and optional force flag to ensure it starts a new transcription job or reuses an existing one, returning HTTP 200.

title: get processing status for a video transcription job
description: Test the GET /api/video/status endpoint with a valid videoId to verify it returns the current transcription job status including progress and stage with HTTP 200, and returns 404 if no job is found.

title: fetch final transcript json for a video
description: Test the GET /api/video/transcript/{videoId} endpoint with a valid videoId path parameter to ensure it returns the complete transcript JSON with HTTP 200, or 404 if the transcript does not exist.

title: check availability of ai providers
description: Test the GET /api/ai/status endpoint to verify it returns the health status and available models of LM Studio and Groq AI providers with HTTP 200.

title: ask questions about a video using transcript
description: Test the POST /api/ai/query endpoint by submitting a valid videoId and question in the request body to ensure it returns an AI-generated answer with optional citations and HTTP 200.

title: generate structured video summaries
description: Test the POST /api/complete-ai/summary endpoint with a valid videoId and optional length and style parameters to verify it returns a structured summary payload with HTTP 200.
